mcq.statement: Choose the correct sentence: Whom do you wish to punish?, Which do you wish to punish?, Whose do you wish to punish?, Who do you wish to punish?

options.a: Whom do you wish to punish?
options.b: Which do you wish to punish?
options.c: Whose do you wish to punish?
options.d: Who do you wish to punish?
